description: Validates the custom domain mapping to ensure it maps to the correct CDN endpoint in DNS.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2017-04-02.

hostname.description: The host name of the custom domain. Must be a domain name.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

profile_name.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

endpoint_name.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
